message.body: Hi hunter this is Lauren. We will be back by 830 to put cats away. Can you wait to start until then or do you need to get in sooner? Thanks.
I've gotta grab some tools and supplies so I will be there after 830
Good morning hunter. We just left. The animals are all away. If you need to get into the basement please go in through the basement door in the back yard. It's unlocked. Thanks.
Can I use the microwave for my lunch, or is the dog in there?
Sure. She's in the far back room. If you can try to be quiet so she doesn't freak out and make sure to close the fence and the pocket door when you're done that would be great. Have a nice day!
Where are the tile for the floor
In the very front room of the basement. There is a curtain that it is behind.
